item.title: 欧洲央行限制黑盒模型以结束风险贷款僵局
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）已经结束了与银行在需要为高风险贷款预留多少资金问题上的长期对峙，在此之前，欧洲中央银行减少了对其要求的数十亿额外准备金背后的一个有争议的模型的使用。【原文：The European Central Bank has ended a long standoff with banks over how much money they need to set aside for risky loans, after scaling back use of a controversial model behind its demand for billions in additional provisions.】

item.title: 国际刑事法院推迟杜特尔特听证会以决定他是否适合受审
item.description: 国际刑事法院决定推迟确认对菲律宾前总统罗德里戈-杜特尔特指控的听证会，以确定他的身体状况是否足以接受审判。【原文：The International Criminal Court has decided to postpone a hearing on the confirmation of charges against former Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte to determine whether he is well enough to stand trial.】

item.title: 加拿大公用事业公司准备出售 5 亿加元债务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大公用事业有限公司正在寻求出售约 5 亿加元（3.62 亿美元）的次级债。【原文：Canadian Utilities Ltd. is looking to sell around C$500 million ($362 million) of subordinated debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: ElevenLabs 以 66 亿美元估值让员工出售股票
item.description:
对这家语音生成人工智能初创公司的要约收购由红杉资本（Sequoia Capital）和 Iconiq Growth 主导。【原文：

The tender offer for the voice-generating AI startup is being led by Sequoia Capital and Iconiq Growth.

】

item.title: 阿波罗、战神为利夫家居提供 40 亿美元私人信贷交易
item.description: 据一封电子邮件声明称，私募股权住宅服务公司利福家居已调整了其资本结构，从 Ares Management Corp. 获得了新的优先股权，从阿波罗全球管理公司获得了债务融资，并收购了伊利家居。【原文：Private equity-owned residential services company Leaf Home has shuffled its capital structure with new preferred equity from Ares Management Corp. and debt financing from Apollo Global Management Inc., and acquired Erie Home, according to an emailed statement.】

item.title: 策略师认为美联储降息刺激美股上涨
item.description: 在本周关键经济数据公布之前，美国主要股指周一开盘上涨，因为交易员们押注美联储降息将推动股市进一步上涨。【原文：Major US indexes rose at the open Monday ahead of key economic data this week as traders are betting that a Federal Reserve interest rate cut will fuel further stock market gains.】

item.title: HPE 启动高等级债券销售，帮助偿还瞻博网络债务
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，惠普企业公司（Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co.【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. is selling investment-grade bonds, in part to help refinance debt related to Juniper Networks, a company it recently acquired, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Uber 今年首次进入投资级债券市场
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is tapping the US investment-grade bond market Monday for its first blue-chip debt sale this year.】

item.title: Databricks 以超过 1000 亿美元的估值融资 10 亿美元
item.description: 世界上最有价值的初创公司之一 Databricks Inc.【原文：Databricks Inc., one of the world’s most valuable startups, said it closed a $1 billion funding round, valuing the software provider at more than $100 billion.】

item.title: 谷歌因违反垄断被广告交易所起诉
item.description: Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司被广告交易商 PubMatic 公司起诉，后者声称这家搜索巨头非法垄断了广告技术市场，要求谷歌赔偿数十亿美元。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google was sued by advertising exchange PubMatic Inc., which is seeking billions of dollars over its claim that the search giant has illegally monopolized the ad technology market.】

item.title: 印尼部长突然离职引发全球基金警觉
item.description:
财政部资深官员、财政稳定倡导者斯里-穆利亚尼-因德拉瓦蒂（Sri Mulyani Indrawati）的去职有可能加剧市场波动。【原文：

The removal of Sri Mulyani Indrawati, a finance ministry veteran and an advocate for fiscal stability, risks raising market volatility.

】

item.title: 美国医疗保健行业招聘放缓为更广阔的就业市场敲响警钟
item.description: 美国医疗保健行业的招聘情况看起来越来越不稳定，鉴于其在过去三年中作为就业增长主要驱动力的重要性，这给经济敲响了警钟。【原文：Hiring in the US health care sector is looking increasingly shaky, raising a warning flag for the economy given its importance as a key driver of job growth over the last three years.】

item.title: 斯特拉斯科纳提高 MEG 出价，阻止石油公司与 Cenovus 的交易
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省的斯特拉斯科纳资源有限公司（Strathcona Resources Ltd.）提高了对油砂生产商 MEG Energy Corp. 的出价，试图阻止该公司出售给加拿大一家更大的竞争对手。【原文：Alberta’s Strathcona Resources Ltd. increased its bid for oil sands producer MEG Energy Corp., seeking to break up the company’s sale to a larger Canadian rival.】

item.title: 比亚迪加大欧洲市场推广力度，车型增加一倍多
item.description: 在中国国内价格战愈演愈烈之际，比亚迪公司正通过新车型和展厅加强其在欧洲的扩张。【原文：BYD Co. is reinforcing its European expansion with new models and showrooms amid a bruising price war at home in China.】

item.title: 加密资产管理公司 CoinShares 将通过 SPAC 交易在美国上市
item.description: 加密货币资产管理公司 CoinShares International Ltd. 已同意通过与空白支票公司 Vine Hill Capital Investment Corp. 合并的方式在美国上市。【原文：Cryptocurrency asset manager CoinShares International Ltd. has agreed to go public in the US through a combination with blank-check company Vine Hill Capital Investment Corp.】

item.title: 斯卡拉穆奇在针对贫困地区的基金上下注，结果却让客户大失所望
item.description: 安东尼-斯卡拉穆奇（Anthony Scaramucci）正在努力将唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的一项重大税收减免政策转化为他富有客户的利润。然而，华尔街人称 "Mooch "的斯卡拉穆奇却一直在收取酬金。【原文：Anthony Scaramucci is struggling to spin one of President Donald Trump’s big tax breaks into a profit for his wealthy clients. Yet “the Mooch,” as he’s known on Wall Street, keeps getting paid his fees.】

item.title: Hilco 分拆房地产业务，计划成立 2.5 亿美元基金
item.description: Hilco Global 已敲定分拆房地产部门 HRP 集团，同时寻求筹集新的投资基金。【原文：Hilco Global has finalized the spinoff of property unit HRP Group as it seeks to raise a new investment fund.】

item.title: 纳斯达克寻求美国证券交易委员会修改规则以交易代币化股票
item.description: 纳斯达克公司正在请求监管机构允许投资者在其交易所交易代币化的股票，此举可能标志着区块链技术在美国股票市场核心领域的首次重大测试。【原文：Nasdaq Inc. is asking regulators to let investors trade tokenized versions of stocks on its exchange, a move that could mark the first big test of blockchain technology inside the core of America’s equity markets.】

item.title: 中国企业中标喀麦隆-乍得贸易公路建设项目
item.description: 非洲开发银行（African Development Bank）已批准将重建喀麦隆北部 278 公里公路的合同授予四家中国公司，这条公路对喀麦隆与邻国乍得的贸易至关重要。【原文：The African Development Bank has approved the award of contracts to four Chinese companies to reconstruct a 278-kilometer highway in Cameroon’s north that’s vital for trade with neighboring Chad.】

item.title: 无与伦比的篮球联赛估值达 3.4 亿美元
item.description: 3 对 3 职业女子篮球联赛 Unrivaled 在首个赛季结束后，估值已达 3.4 亿美元。【原文：Unrivaled, the 3-on-3 professional women’s basketball league, has reached a $340 million valuation after its debut season.】

item.title: 里克-佩里的能源基础设施房地产投资信托基金费米公司申请首次公开募股
item.description: 由德克萨斯州前州长里克-佩里（Rick Perry）共同创办的房地产投资信托公司费米公司（Fermi Inc.【原文：Fermi Inc., a real estate investment trust co-founded by former Texas Governor Rick Perry, has filed for an initial public offering as it looks to create a campus for energy-intensive computing in Amarillo, Texas.】

item.title: 欧佩克+在石油市场对决中反击华尔街
item.description:
通过再次提高产量，该集团显示出对需求的信心，即使在中国经济不景气的情况下也是如此。【原文：

By raising output again, the group shows confidence in demand even with China’s wobbling economy.

】

item.title: 泰铢汇率创四年新高，泰国誓言抑制泰铢波动
item.description: 在泰铢升至四年高位后，泰国央行誓言采取措施缓解泰铢波动并限制黄金价格的影响。【原文：Thailand’s central bank vowed to take steps to ease baht volatility and limit the influence of gold prices after the local currency rallied to a four-year high.】

item.title: TPG 以 2.9 亿美元交易支持 Earnix 的延续基金
item.description: 私募股权公司 TPG GP Solutions LP 与以色列耶路撒冷风险投资公司 (Jerusalem Venture Partners, JVP) 达成协议，投资保险技术公司 Earnix Inc.【原文：Private equity firm TPG GP Solutions LP has invested in a single-asset continuation vehicle for the insurance technology company Earnix Inc. in a deal with Israel’s Jerusalem Venture Partners (JVP) valued at $290 million.】

item.title: 魁北克追回对已倒闭的 Northvolt 公司的 2 亿加元投资
item.description: 魁北克省经济部长表示，加拿大魁北克省已成功收回对破产电动汽车电池制造商 Northvolt AB 的部分投资。【原文：Quebec’s economy minister says that the Canadian province has managed to recoup part of its investment in bankrupt electric vehicle battery maker Northvolt AB.】

item.title: 土耳其警察向反对派总部外发射催泪瓦斯
item.description: 周一，土耳其防暴警察向主要反对党伊斯坦布尔总部外的抗议者施放催泪瓦斯，政治僵局愈演愈烈。【原文：Turkish riot police used tear gas on protesters outside the main opposition party’s Istanbul headquarters on Monday, amid a mounting political standoff.】

item.title: 分析师对印尼财政状况表示担忧，印尼资产感到不安
item.description: 据分析人士称，财政部长斯里-穆利亚尼-因德拉瓦蒂（Sri Mulyani Indrawati）的下台将考验印尼的财政纪律，并可能导致资本外逃。【原文：Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati’s ouster will test Indonesia’s fiscal discipline and may lead to capital flight from the nation, according to analysts.】

item.title: 票务平台 StubHub 在美国首次公开募股中募集 8.51 亿美元
item.description: 门票销售平台 StubHub 控股公司正寻求在首次公开募股中筹集高达 8.51 亿美元的资金。【原文：Ticket selling platform StubHub Holdings Inc. is seeking to raise as much as $851 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 智利消费者价格在关键利率会议前夕保持稳定
item.description: 在智利央行行长开会确定基准利率的前一天公布的一份报告显示，智利上个月的消费价格没有变化。【原文：Chile’s consumer prices were unchanged last month, according to a report published one day before central bankers meet to set the benchmark interest rate.】

item.title: 网络安全公司 Netskope 寻求 IPO 筹资 8.13 亿美元
item.description: 云安全服务提供商 Netskope 公司正寻求在首次公开募股中筹集高达 8.13 亿美元的资金，因为各家公司都在抢滩接近历史高点的美国股票市场。【原文：Netskope Inc., a cloud security provider, is seeking to raise as much as $813 million in an initial public offering, as companies rush to tap a US equity market that’s nearing record highs.】
